module TopModule(
  input logic clk,
  input logic reset,
  output logic [31:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (reset) begin
    q <= 32'h1; // Explicit size for the constant
  end else begin
    q <= {q[0] ^ q[1] ^ q[21] ^ q[30], q[31:1]};
  end
end

endmodule
```

issues: Numeric constants should have explicit size (e.g., 1'b0 not 0)
